ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate
Interface Aggregator<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
Chooser, Concat, Max, Min, Sum
public interface Aggregator<T>

Defines an aggregation operation, i.e. how to aggregate the items of a collection.

Author:
Mario Fusco

Method Summary
 T aggregate(T first, T second)
          Define how this operation aggregates 2 different items
 T emptyItem()
          Returns the idempotent item for this aggregation operation
 

Method Detail

emptyItem

T emptyItem()
Returns the idempotent item for this aggregation operation

aggregate

T aggregate(T first,
            T second)
Define how this operation aggregates 2 different items

Parameters:
first - The first item
second - The second item
Returns:
The aggregation of first and second item
